question: What will the event entail?
answer: The event will kickoff with a short introduction and a quick word from our keynote speaker. Then, the University of Waterlooâ€™s very own green tech teams will take the stage to talk a bit about their work in the UW community. Finally, the Waterloop team will take a few minutes to present and conclude the event.

question: Who is going to be at the event?
answer: We are excited to have our keynote speaker (Mike Morrice), several sustainable tech teams at the University of Waterloo (Waterloo Formula Electric, UWAFT, Midnight Sun, Warrior Home, Sustainable Development Solutions Network, and UW Energy Network), and Waterloop speaking at our event!

question: Why should I come to this event?
answer: This event is a great opportunity to discover what is happening at the University of Waterloo and an opportunity to get involved. Each of the teams featured recruit members a few times a year making this a great chance for you to get involved, learn new skills, and make new friends!
